data.title: Hajeri: Positions, Relations and Network
data.meta_description: Chairman at GFH Financial Group BSC, Discover Ghazi Faisal Al-Hajeri's known position history, network and 65 relationships. Find out about his known public assets.
data.text:
Investment ManagersFinance

Wafra International Investment Co. (Wafra) is the investment management subsidiary of the Government of Kuwait's Public Institution for Social Security of Kuwait. Headquartered in Safat, the firm was founded in 1994 and aims to ensure financial investment in all economic sectors inside and outside Kuwait, including investing and trading shares in the GCC and Arabian markets; managing different types of financial portfolios and investment funds; providing forward services and future sales in the local markets; preparing and managing public and private offerings in both local and Arabian markets; conducting studies and specialized analytical research covering local and Arabian markets and providing margin financing.

Agricultural Commodities/MillingProcess Industries

Pure Harvest Smart Farms operates as an agricultural technology firm which focuses on the production of greenhouse fruits and vegetables. The company was founded by Sky Kurtz, Robert Kupstas and Mahmoud Ali in 2016 and is headquartered in Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates.

Investment ManagersFinance

Wafra, Inc. is a registered investment adviser headquartered in New York City. The firm was founded in 1985 and is wholly owned by Wafra InterVest Corp., which in turn is ultimately wholly beneficially owned by the Public Institution for Social Security of Kuwait (PIFSS), an autonomous agency controlled by the government of Kuwait. Wafra provides advisory and consulting services to funds, separately managed accounts and joint venture arrangements.
